headline: VP of Marketing at Symmetry Systems
summary: Executive leader with more than 15 years of experience driving successful marketing programs, including over 10 years in product marketing. Identifies strategic priorities through market analysis, manages product development, and leads product launches. Leverages competitive analysis to create compelling customer-facing content and sales enablement materials that drive customer acquisition and retention. Mentors teams to meet customer needs and long-term business objectives.
organization_description_1: Built Marketing Department from the ground up, establishing initial marketing strategy, budget requirements, and team growth plan.   Created company and product messaging frameworks. Developed compelling marketing content including customer case studies, white papers, website messaging, and product data sheets.   Evaluated organizational needs and formed strategies to fill gaps. Selected, hired, and managed creative agencies and public relations, marketing operations, and graphic design contractors.
organization_2: University of Maryland - Robert H. Smith School of Business
organization_description_2: Course Instructor for BMGT367: Career Search Strategies in Business.  Leverages public speaking and professional experience to teach career strategies and business to classes of 50 students.
organization_description_3: Drives successful marketing initiatives for cybersecurity and physical security clients. Defines strategic vision and leads product development, product launch, messaging, and collateral creation. Uses competitive analysis to set pricing. Sample projects completed for clients:   Provided marketing support to cyber security industry start-up.  Developed website content, data sheets, and persona based collateral for cyber security client.  Provided product development and product launch ideation, process and messaging support.  Developed message hierarchy, content marketing strategy, and content to fuel campaigns to a cyber security client and a physical security client.  Formulated lead generation strategy and wrote demand generation manager job description for physical security start-up.  On a monthly retainer basis, supported German security start-up with website and collateral content review, marketing strategy, and other projects.  For a Dutch start-up, wrote product marketing collateral, sales presentations, competitive battle cards and other marketing assets to support their North American market entry campaign.
organization_description_4: Built Marketing Department from the ground up, establishing initial marketing strategy, budget requirements, and team growth plan. Collaborated with leadership to set goals and forged framework to achieve them. Managed $4M budget.   Developed compelling marketing content, including press releases, blogs, e-books, customer case studies, white papers, request for proposal and request for information (RFP/RFI) response kit, and product data sheets.   Evaluated organizational needs and formed strategies to fill gaps. Selected, hired, and managed creative agencies and public relations, digital marketing, and graphic design contractors.   Created company and product message hierarchies and company mission statement. Relaunched website, testing and refining 3 versions of online messaging to optimize results. Devised and implemented social media strategy.  Owned competitive analysis, including analysis of messaging to develop internal materials that enabled sellers to effectively position and differentiate their products.   Drove analyst relations strategy that helped establish and solidify the company’s position in the market, resulting in Feroot’s inclusion in Gartner 2022 Application Security Hype Cycle report.   Launched digital advertising, setting up processes and workflows to grow marketing funnel and lead generation.  Generated 3,000 leads across 2022 marketing campaigns and increased web traffic by 518% in 5 months.
organization_description_5: Spearheaded marketing efforts that secured $53M Goldman Sachs Series B investment. Hired, mentored, and continually challenged team of 5 marketing managers to further expand marketing capabilities.  Launched website, led digital marketing efforts, and repositioned brand and service offerings. Established inbound marketing capabilities, competed in services arena, ensured ease of channel sales efforts, and grew brand recognition.   Developed 32 sales enablement materials that drove 72% year-over-year revenue growth.  Created public relations and analyst relations strategies, earning inclusion in Forrester Now Tech and Wave reports.  Implemented social media marketing strategy that drove brand awareness and company-wide recruiting efforts, tripling social media following across all channels.  Initiated channel marketing program and partner portal. Created channel partner welcome kit and suite of 12 channel enablement and sales tools, which drove channel sales growth.  Directed technology partner marketing efforts. Developed 6 joint solution briefs to drive joint sales opportunities.
organization_title_6: Security Associate Principal, Product Marketing and Management
organization_description_6: Product managed 14 iDefense threat data and threat intelligence collection, aggregation, and analysis applications.   Steered product marketing and communication efforts. Produced 26 pieces of print collateral, launched iDefense blog, delivered persona marketing presentations, and managed creation of the 2018 and 2019 Cyber Threatscape report.   Constructed messaging and value proposition for 5 cyber defense practice areas.   Built out 10 tools and processes for collection and creation of cyber threat intelligence requirements.   Led threat intelligence product delivery process improvements, including standard operating procedure development.
organization_description_7: Established product marketing function. Led product launches for new features and functionality from ideation through test cases, marketing plan buildout, implementation, and activity tracking.   Authored sales enablement collateral, including data sheets, case studies, use cases, and social media campaigns.  Managed analyst relations to gain greater mindshare and industry/market definition.   Helmed integration partner marketing efforts, including collateral, webinars, and demonstration video production.
organization_description_8: Headed channel go-to-market strategy, signing 27 global channel partners within the first 9 months.  Created and launched channel marketing program from scratch, developing sales enablement tools such as instructor-led and on-demand training programs, Joint Marketing Fund process, and electronic deal registration.   Drove product marketing that grew revenue, entering a new market comprised of businesses with 1,000+ employees.  Wrote marketing collateral, edited and produced 4 demonstration videos, built 5 training modules for sales team, and designed portal to enable partner access to customized materials.
organization_description_9: Built a product launch process that shortened time to revenue for the sales team and distributors.   Researched and analyzed competitive intelligence on integrated physical security equipment and developed differentiated marketing collateral.   Launched a product with the metal detectors group and built sales training modules.    Created and deployed user-friendly tools and templates for marketing managers.
organization_title_10: Sales & Marketing Associate (Rotational Post Graduate Program)
organization_description_10: Developed a 3-year strategy to streamline Mexican manufacturing operations, resulting in process improvements, better communication, and cohesiveness between 4 business units.   Compiled a strategic plan for Turkish market entry. By the end of 2014, 2 of the 5 units were on track to triple their revenue by 2018.  In total, the Turkish business grew by 113% in 2014. One of the business units recorded a 255% revenue growth in 2014.  Launched 3 hardware and 1 software product. Established sales and marketing strategies in coordination with global teams, resulting in $91M revenue in 2014.   Deployed an account management and forecasting tool for Turbocor, contributing to the business unit’s 11% revenue growth and eliminating the need to purchase expensive software.
education_1: University of Maryland - Robert H. Smith School of Business
